nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 Token contract, with detached state.
Additionally charges fees on each transfer.
nodes.name: FeeToken

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Constructed transfer fee rate should respect the maximum fee rate"

arguments.value: Constructed transfer fee rate should respect the maximum fee rate

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Constructed transfer fee rate should respect the maximum fee rate"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Transfer fee rate must be below MAX_TRANSFER_FEE_RATE"

arguments.value: Transfer fee rate must be below MAX_TRANSFER_FEE_RATE

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Transfer fee rate must be below MAX_TRANSFER_FEE_RATE"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the transfer fee, anywhere within the range 0-10%.
@dev The fee rate is in decimal format, with UNIT being the value of 100%.
nodes.name: setTransferFeeRate

nodes.documentation:
@notice Set the address of the user/contract responsible for collecting or
distributing fees.
nodes.name: setFeeAuthority

nodes.documentation:
@notice Calculate the Fee charged on top of a value being sent
@return Return the fee charged
nodes.name: transferFeeIncurred

nodes.documentation:
@notice The value that you would need to send so that the recipient receives
a specified value.
nodes.name: transferPlusFee

nodes.documentation: @notice The amount the recipient will receive if you send a certain number of tokens.
nodes.name: amountReceived

nodes.documentation:
@notice Collected fees sit here until they are distributed.
@dev The balance of the nomin contract itself is the fee pool.
nodes.name: feePool

arguments.value: Cannot transfer to the 0 address

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot transfer to the underlying contract"

arguments.value: Cannot transfer to the underlying contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot transfer to the underlying contract"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot transfer to the proxy contract"

arguments.value: Cannot transfer to the proxy contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot transfer to the proxy contract"

nodes.documentation: @notice Base of transfer functions
nodes.name: _internalTransfer

nodes.documentation: @notice ERC20 / ERC223 friendly transfer function.
nodes.name: _transfer_byProxy

nodes.documentation: @notice ERC20 friendly transferFrom function.
nodes.name: _transferFrom_byProxy

nodes.documentation: @notice Ability to transfer where the sender pays the fees (not ERC20)
nodes.name: _transferSenderPaysFee_byProxy

nodes.documentation: @notice Ability to transferFrom where they sender pays the fees (not ERC20).
nodes.name: _transferFromSenderPaysFee_byProxy

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must supply an account address to withdraw fees"

arguments.value: Must supply an account address to withdraw fees

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Must supply an account address to withdraw fees"

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraw tokens from the fee pool into a given account.
@dev Only the fee authority may call this.
nodes.name: withdrawFees

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Must have a balance in order to donate to the fee pool"

arguments.value: Must have a balance in order to donate to the fee pool

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Must have a balance in order to donate to the fee pool"

nodes.documentation: @notice Donate tokens from the sender's balance into the fee pool.
nodes.name: donateToFeePool

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the fee authority can do this action"

arguments.value: Only the fee authority can do this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the fee authority can do this action"

arguments.value: TransferFeeRateUpdated(uint256)
FeeAuthorityUpdated(address)
FeesWithdrawn(address,uint256)
FeesDonated(address,uint256)
